title.native: キャプテン翼シーズン2 ジュニアユース編

description:
The second season of Captain Tsubasa (2018).

The International Junior Youth Tournament in Paris, France, is about to begin, and Tsubasa, Misaki, Wakabayashi, Hyuga, and Wakashimazu are ready. Japan’s team of elite players is to face off against the best the soccer world has to offer. Germany’s Schneider, France’s Pierre, Argentina’s Diaz, and Italy’s Hernandez await, along with a host of other new rivals. Let the battle begin!

(Source: VIZ Media)
hashtag: #キャプテン翼 #ジュニアユース編

node.description:
Youichi Takahashi is a mangaka, best known for [Captain Tsubasa](https://anilist.co/manga/31789/Captain-Tsubasa/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/0728takahashi)

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.
He is a professional screenwriter for anime, drama and theater and is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

Currently freelance. Watanabe started his career as an animator at Tsuchida Production, which he left in July 1986 after the studio's bankruptcy. He then joined Studio Gallop, where he was responsible for the character designs and chief animation direction for the studio's mahou shoujo titles such as [Hime-chan no Ribbon](https://anilist.co/anime/2037/), which was his debut as a character designer, [Akazukin Chacha](https://anilist.co/anime/103/) and [Nurse Angel Ririka SOS](https://anilist.co/anime/616/) as well as the hit TV anime series [Kodomo no Omocha](https://anilist.co/anime/1486/).

Frequent collaborator with [Akitarou Daichi](https://anilist.co/staff/100640/).

Currently freelance. Watanabe started his career as an animator at Tsuchida Production, which he left in July 1986 after the studio's bankruptcy. He then joined Studio Gallop, where he was responsible for the character designs and chief animation direction for the studio's mahou shoujo titles such as [Hime-chan no Ribbon](https://anilist.co/anime/2037/), which was his debut as a character designer, [Akazukin Chacha](https://anilist.co/anime/103/) and [Nurse Angel Ririka SOS](https://anilist.co/anime/616/) as well as the hit TV anime series [Kodomo no Omocha](https://anilist.co/anime/1486/).

Frequent collaborator with [Akitarou Daichi](https://anilist.co/staff/100640/).

**Residency:** Tokyo, Japan

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HirokazuShiba)**

**Shiba Hirokazu** is a Japanese animation producer.

WEST. (formerly known as Johnny's West) is a boyband consisting of seven members formed under the Johnny & Associates talent agency.

The members are:
- Daiki Shigeoka
- Junta Nakama
- Takahiro Hamada
- Akito Kiriyama
- Tomohiro Kamiyama
- Ryusei Fujii
- Nozomu Kotaki

__[Website](http://takuyawatanabe.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/takuya88699231)__

__Birthplace:__ Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan

__Takuya Watanabe__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger, music producer and guitarist.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/228410/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/rollo_alfredo) | [Instagram 1](https://Instagram.com/alfredo_rollodub/) | [Instagram 2](https://www.instagram.com/rollou_insight/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/alfredo.sa.54) | [Website](https://alfredorollovoz.wixsite.com/alfredo-rollo---psic)

Alfredo dos Santos Rollo, better known only as Alfredo Rollo, is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, psychologist, psychoanalyst, and psychodramatist. He is married to the voice actress [Melissa Garcia](https://anilist.co/staff/103053/).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Lucifer Mornigstar (Lucifer)
- James "Jim" Halpert (The Office)
- Gideon Graves (Scott Pilgrim vs. The World)
- Lass Isolet (Grand Chase Classic and Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Julian Solo / Poseidon (Saint Seiya: Soldiers' Soul)
- Dewey Finn (1st dub; School of Rock)
- Chuckie Sullivan (1st dub; Good Will Hunting)
- Marcus (Arcane)
- Stu Pickles (2nd voice; Rugrats franchise)
- Josh (Detroit: Become Human)
- Vic (Disney Universe)
- Cha Sung-Te (Big Mouth South Korean TV series)
!~

Affiliated with [Studio KAI](https://anilist.co/studio/6312/Studio-KAI).

*Not to be confused with the older [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/184194)*
